title.rendered: Technical Program Intern at Newton School, Bangalore [Stipend Available] Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Online applications are welcome for the Technical Program Intern position at Newton School, Bangalore. Check the eligibility and other important details below!

About Newton school

Be part of a rocket ship that’s creating a massive impact in the world of education!

On one side, you have over a million college graduates every year with barely 5% employability rates, and on the other, thousands of companies struggle to find talent. Newton School aims to bridge this massive gap through its personalised learning platform. We are building an online university and solving the deep problem of the employability of graduates.

They have a strong core team consisting of alumni from IITs and IIMs, who have several years of industry experience in companies like Unacademy, Inmobi, Ola, and Microsoft, among others. On this mission, we are backed by some of the most respected investors around the world – RTP Global, Nexus Venture Partners and a slew of angel investors, including CRED’s Kunal Shah, Flipkart’s Kalyan Krishnamoorthy, Unacademy and Razorpay founders, Udaan’s Sujeet Kumar among others.

Job Summary

  • A minimum commitment of 3 months is required. 
  • Technical Program Intern in Full Stack Development Department.
  • This will be a full-time in-office internship in Bangalore. 

Roles & responsibilities:

  • Researching and identifying relevant topics and trends in the field of computer science and programming.
  • Designing and creating technical problems and exercises that test various coding skills and concepts.
  • Coordinate course content creation (notes, assignments, questions, tests, solutions, etc.)
  • Collaborate with multiple teams and stakeholders to deliver an exceptional learning experience
  • Understanding student feedback & analytics about course content & improving in further iterations.
  • Should be comfortable making calls for student counselling.

Requirements

  • Excellent written English and communication skills
  • Flair for creating engaging & learner friendly content
  • Open to learn new computer science technologies
  • Proficient in Computer Science fundamentals
  • Should be well versed with React.Js and DSA

Mandatory Skills

  • React.js,
  • DSA
  • Computer Science
  • Programming
  • Communication SkillsLocation

How to apply?

Eligible and interested candidates can apply via this link.

Location

Bangalore, Karnataka, India.
